column5: I'm looking for a couple of pairs of broken snowshoes to try to repair... anybody got any kicking around in the garage??
No snowshoes TJ, but I do have a couple pair of old work boots that I use to cut the grass with that you can have.    Whopper
How about socks?  Do you do socks?  I have a few pairs with pink spots on them.
if anyone sends me a pair, i'll sit on them, that'll break them for sure. then we can send them to TJ...  group effort LOL
Ohhhhhhh..... you guys are alot of help.....   you must be  a riot when somebody hurts theselves... lol
You talkin the wood frame busted or the stringin?? I'll go check the many pairs hanging on the hangar wall. Shipping would be the profitless side of this.....
I may have a pair I wore the treads off of .Not much snow here and the gravel tears them up.

Doesnt matter what shape they are in....  if the woods broken thats ok too...  I can get the stuff to repair them, so i just want to see what kind of a job I could do...  And no art.. no gravelly ones...  geeezzzzz
Geez TJ, the reputation you have with equipment, I am surprised you couldn't fill out this request yourself!
You can't have mine, we use them to decorate the house when they are too worn.  Pam
Dirty Snowshoe recipe; 1 part Jack Daniels 1 part Peppermint Schnapps ice, stir and enjoy!!! Darn, different type of snow shoe! HH
